footer.description: Circle Creative Buro – your guide to the world of creativity and creative potential.

qualityFirst.title: We do everything for you
qualityFirst.description: We take care of everything and deliver perfect results.

creativeSolutions.title: Meeting deadlines
creativeSolutions.description: You always receive your project on time.

innovation.title: Everything for the client
innovation.description: We consider every detail to exceed your expectations.

semicircle.title: Semi Circle
semicircle.subtitle: SINGLE TASK

cycle.title: Cycle
cycle.subtitle: MONTHLY

aboutUs.title: From idea to reality
aboutUs.subtitle: About Us
aboutUs.paragraph1: Circle Creative Buro has been operating since June 2025 and has set itself the goal of creating creative ideas for our clients by offering unique commercial proposals that have not yet been seen on the market.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our task is to help your brand work in such a way that people see your uniqueness and competitiveness among your peers.

contactForm.title: Contact us to start your creative project
contactForm.subtitle: Book a consultation with our expert to discuss your project requirements and get personalized recommendations

launchPr.title: Launch and PR
launchPr.item6: Promotional activities: barter, collaborations, influencers, and special offers

socialMedia.title: Social Media packaging
socialMedia.item5: Full profile setup for Instagram and TikTok

items.service: Mini website or landing page (if included in the task)

notes.note1: • We don't take a commission for printing, you only pay for the production itself.
notes.note2: • You can choose between two trusted print shops: one is more budget-friendly, the other offers premium quality.
notes.note3: • All materials (designs, photos, videos) must be approved by the client before publication.
notes.note4: • After approval, changes can only be made within 2 calendar days.
notes.note5: • Clear content deadlines are set in advance and agreed upon by both parties.

design.title: Design
design.item1: Posts and animations for social media - 10

digitalServices.title: Digital-Services
digitalServices.item1: Collaboration ideas per month (come up with the concept and design)
digitalServices.item3: Monthly report (what worked, how people reacted, and what we recommend next)

notes.note1: • We don't take a commission for printing, you only pay for the production itself.
notes.note2: • You can choose between two trusted print shops: one is more budget-friendly, the other offers premium quality.
notes.note3: • All materials (designs, photos, videos) must be approved by the client before publication.
notes.note4: • After approval, changes can only be made within 2 calendar days.
notes.note5: • Clear content deadlines are set in advance and agreed upon by both parties.
notes.note6: • If your desired service isn't listed, we're open to custom solutions and new formats.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.item1: Concept and visual packaging of the partnership/collaboration
marketing.item2: Mini-event support: poster, story, video invitation, pop-up or welcome zone design, photo/video shooting

smm.title: SMM
smm.item3Sub: cover design for social media posts (instagram/tiktok)
smm.item4: Adapting visual and text to current trends or recommwndations

items.service: Guidebook (logo, font, color palette, merch, etc.)

notes.note1: ✦ We don't take a commission for printing, you only pay for the production itself.
notes.note2: ✦ You can choose between two trusted print shops: one is more budget-friendly, the other offers premium quality.
notes.note3: ✦ All materials (designs, photos, videos) must be approved by the client before publication.
notes.note4: ✦ After approval, changes can only be made within 2 calendar days.
notes.note5: ✦ Clear content deadlines are set in advance and agreed upon by both parties.
notes.note6: ✦ If your desired service isn't listed, we're open to custom solutions and new formats.

placeholderCards.text1: We turn clients’ challenges into effective solutions that deliver results.
placeholderCards.text2: Every project is unique to us — we always seek the best solution for each client.
placeholderCards.title3: A Team that Delivers Turnkey Solutions
placeholderCards.text3: Our team brings together strategists, designers, and marketers to handle every task turnkey.
placeholderCards.title4: Focused Only on What Truly Works
placeholderCards.text4: Your results matter, which is why we focus on what truly works.
placeholderCards.title21: Transparency and Openness at Every Stage
placeholderCards.text21: We keep our clients informed — transparency and openness at every stage..
placeholderCards.text22: Our team consists of experts who stay on top of market trends and implement them into your campaigns.
placeholderCards.text31: We don’t use templates – only personalized solutions created just for you.
placeholderCards.text32: We value our clients’ time, working quickly, clearly, and without delays..
placeholderCards.title33: Advertising as a Partnership for Growth
placeholderCards.text33: With us, you get more than advertising — you gain a partner that helps your business grow.
placeholderCards.text34: We love what we do and make sure you can feel it in every project.

quiz.headline: Find Your Perfect Service
quiz.subheadline: Let us guide you to the service that perfectly matches your needs and goals

start_screen.title: Ready to discover your ideal service?
start_screen.description: Answer a few simple questions and we'll recommend the perfect solution for you

questions.1: Do you already have an existing business?
questions.2: Do you need a one-time solution (like a website, campaign, or visuals)?
questions.3: Is creating a strong brand identity important for your launch?
questions.4: Do you plan to run ongoing marketing campaigns and social media content?
questions.5: Would you prefer a monthly subscription where our team supports your brand continuously?

options.no_full_branding: No, I want a full branding package
options.no_quick_start: No, I just need something quick to start
options.no_basics: No, I only need the basics
options.no_one_time: No, I prefer a one-time or full-package solution

employeeCards.title: Our Team
employeeCards.subtitle: We are a group of dedicated professionals with diverse skills and a shared passion for our work.

employee2.name: Shugyla Madikhan

employee5.name: Sundetova Aruzhan

employee6.name: Zhumasheva Alina

employee7.name: Adesh Dana

employee8.name: Murtazina Alina

employee9.name: Atabayeva Adina
employee9.bio: “Creativity is my courage to be myself”
